name: Bagging Simulator
description:
Made for the 20 Second Game Jam!

BAGGING SIMULATOR!

A game where you must bag each customers groceries according to their demands. Don't over-fill or miss any, customers these days are horribly nit-picky and will not tolerate the slightest of failures! You only have 20 seconds, that's it! So stay focused!

RULES!

× W, A, S, D or Arrows Keys to Control Bagger.

× Grab the groceries according to the Customers List.

× Keep an eye out for Powerups and Powerdowns!!

GROCERIES!

 Cereal

 Tomato Sauce  Can of Goods  Loaf of Bread  Orange

 Slab of Raw Meat

 Ice Cold Soda (Freezes Time)

 Rotten Drink (-2 Secs from Time)

Music by Chance de la Soul
